pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.3: “The threshold”, _ummāra_, would seem to refer the entry point to the charnel ground. Sp-yoj.1.263: _Ummārepīti susānassa indakhīlepi_, “_Ummārepī_: also at the entry post to the charnel ground.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.3.3: These are dung, urine, ash, and clay, see [Kd 6:14.6.4](pli-tv-kd6:14.6.4).
